galaxy.summary: FCS-GX detects contamination from foreign organisms in genome sequences using the genome cross-species aligner (GX).
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: The NCBI Foreign Contamination Screen (FCS) is a tool suite for identifying and removing contaminant sequences in genome assemblies. Contaminants are defined as sequences in a dataset that do not originate from the biological source organism and can arise from a variety of environmental and laboratory sources. FCS will help you remove contaminants from genomes before submission to GenBank.
